column2: Latest;Sihanoukville: A report reached police of a motorcycle rickshaw driver dead in his tuk tuk in the forest
column3: ------After hearing the news from Sangkat No1
column5: the Royal Military Police force immediately intervened.------Colonel Hort Seyha
column6: commander of the Royal Gendarmerieâ€™s Royal Military Police in Sihanoukville
column7: who declined to identify the man
column8: said the driver was so drunk he lost consciousness on the night of the 26th May. People passing mistook him for dead and phoned in the crime.------The cops contacted relatives and the drunk man finally went home.------https://kbn.news/archives/123970
